title: UEFA ( Union of European Football Associations ) total revenue 2004 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, containing a total of 14 data points.
Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
The highest Revenue in million euros, of value 4579.8 was reached at Year 2015/16
The lowest Revenue in million euros, of value 659.2 was reported at Year 2004/05

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Revenue in million euros has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
The highest Revenue in million euros, of value 4579.8 was reached at Year 2015/16
The lowest Revenue in million euros, of value 659.2 was reported at Year 2004/05
The line significantly increased by 1411.6 from Year 2010/11 to 2011/12, and lastly, increased by 2480.39 from Year 2014/15 to 2015/16.
